Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: The budget is the talk of the people in Australian politics and anticipation is high ahead of Budget2023. There's hope that it'll bring a small surplus for the first time in 15 years with less debt and future-focused spending. Also people are urging the government to prioritize low-income households in a home energy retrofit program. The state's police departments are hiring more officers and offering a cost-of-living bonus for recruits. There's even hope that access to primary healthcare and GPs will improve with funding from the Federal budget. It's clear that the budget could make or break many Australians.
